General.Name: Tongxing Environmental Protection
General.Description: Tongxing Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd provides environmental protection project general contracting services in China. It offers environmental protection equipment and materials for dust removal, desulfurization, and denitrification; flue gas treatment services; production and support services for low temperature denitration catalysts; and technical support services for carbon dioxide capture and utilization. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Hefei, China.
